attributes.title: My Grandchildren photos we ERASED
attributes.review: When I opened this app I was so excited because Donald j Trump is my orange Jesus. However, when I opened the app my phone screen WENT BLACK. I took it to the store and they said there was a virus, so after time and a lot of money I had to get a new phone. I lost all my photos of my grandkids. I have never been so mad or furious at an app.

attributes.title: awful!
attributes.review: this app is so bad! it continuously glitches out everytime i open it. i have a brand new phone so it isnâ€™t that. it sends me super loud notifications at night even when my ringer is off. i am completely DISGUSTED with this app. i was just on here to see whether i should vote for trump again and now i have my answer. NO.

attributes.title: Orange fingers
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app because I absolutely ADORE Donald J Trump he is my savior. After opening the app my finger started turning orange I donâ€™t know if this is happened to anyone else?? I tried washing off my hands but it doesnâ€™t work itâ€™s like painted on me like a tan or something. So this app is getting one out of five stars I donâ€™t think Iâ€™m going to vote for Trump anymore.

attributes.userName: uou dknt need to nnow my name
attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This is the hands down WORST app to ever be made. It was a waist of my time and if I could possibly give this app a negative 10, trust me, I would. Trump and his campaign waisted their money big time making this app. The app shows that not only do you hear about trumps wrongs, you see it yourself through a glass screen. Horrible, disgusting, saddening app

attributes.title: Glitches and Bugs
attributes.review: Every time I opened the app it would crash and go to my home screen. I tried re-installing, powering off my phone, and just waiting for a little bit. I know it has nothing to do with my phone because all of the other devices on it work just fine.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with our brilliant presidents campaign, but the app kept freezing and closing on the loading screen. When I finally did get further in and gave my personal information I kept getting spam calls... Iâ€™ve heard rumors that this app has been hacked and information leaked.

attributes.title: Worst president Iâ€™ve ever seen
attributes.review: Okay he is not helping the US at all at this point, and Iâ€™m not like other people who just say heâ€™s blatantly racist but he has a bit of a loose leash when it comes to twitter and public speaking which I donâ€™t really like. Not to mention he hasnâ€™t done one of the main thing his campaign was built on, building the wall.
